layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x38
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x38
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x22
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 22x22 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 20x20
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 20x16
layer at (11,11) size 16x16 clip at (12,12) size 14x14 scrollWidth 704 scrollHeight 504
  LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 16x16 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
    LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (2,2) size 12x12 [border: (1px solid #008000)]
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (1,1) size 702x502 [border: (1px solid #FF0000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 60x19
          text run at (1,1) width 60: "scrollbars"
